ai-tha-ap152:0.3_0: The Elder Nuns said this to the Elder Nun:
ai-tha-ap152:1.4_0: Surpassing the north of his beauty
ai-tha-ap152:3.2_0: Then I sat on a couch.
ai-tha-ap152:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap152:3.4_0: this is the fruit of couch.
ai-tha-ap152:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Posture.
ai-tha-ap152:7.1_0: Thirty-Three Elder Nuns, having sat down on the tenth seats.
ai-tha-ap152:10.1_0: And what is the six kinds of distension,
ai-tha-ap152:10.6_0: you have looked on all these six things.
